name: Geyik Reçeli | A Game for Superior Species
name_original: Geyik Reçeli | A Game for Superior Species
description:
Geyik Reçeli | A Game for Superior Species is a short graphical text-based a game which explores the idea of a game which evolves past the need to have a player. The game has several endings which are decided by in-game choices made by the player.

Used Assets:

  • Fonts: qtly by zamfofex.
  • Sounds: Button sound by LittleRobotSoundFactory, Wind sound by kangaroovindaloo.
  • Images: Galaxy Brain Meme Image by Unknown.

All other assets have been made by our team.
